Equivalent ratios mean the same unit rate, so the amount of one quantity for each unit of another is identical. In this case, each mixture will taste the same if the amount of red punch per cup of lime juice is consistent (meaning the ratios are equivalent). Check the values in the ratio table and share your ideas about the taste of the new mixture and your reasoning.
